xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.5 Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.5.2 Akusalapada » 2.5.2.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Naadhipati
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Naadhipati
81.
1423Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
82.
1424Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1425Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1426Naadhipatipaccayā hetuyā nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1427(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
<< Hetuup2.5.2.7 Pañhāvāra >>
